Reference

All functions

draw_key_hpath() draw_key_pointrangeh() draw_key_crossbarh() draw_key_boxploth()

Horizontal key drawing functions

geom_barh() geom_colh()

Bars, rectangles with bases on y-axis

geom_boxploth()

Horizontal box and whiskers plot.

geom_histogramh()

Horizontal histograms and frequency polygons.

geom_crossbarh() geom_errorbarh() geom_linerangeh() geom_pointrangeh()

Horizontal intervals: lines, crossbars & errorbars.

geom_violinh()

Horizontal violin plot.

mean_cl_boot_h() mean_cl_normal_h() mean_sdl_h() median_hilow_h()

Horizontal versions of summary functions from Hmisc

mean_se_h()

Calculate mean and standard error

position_dodgev() position_dodge2v() position_jitterdodgev() position_stackv() position_fillv()

Vertical Positions

stat_binh()

Horizontal binning.

stat_boxploth()

Horizontal boxplot computation.

stat_counth()

Horizontal counting.

stat_summaryh()

Horizontal summary.

stat_xdensity()

Density computation on x axis.
